desc: Hand-poured wax melts. Strong long lasting luxury home fragrance. Beautifully packaged, perfect treat for yourself or a gift for someone special. View our Wellbeing range which aims to help relax the mind, unwind and get a better nights sleep. Our melts use soy wax and are vegan friendly and plastic free.

layout.text: fill your home with melting dreams
luxury hand poured soy wax melts & candles
